event.description: Yunel Escobar flies out to right fielder Matt Joyce.
Kole Calhoun grounds out sharply, second baseman Jed Lowrie to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Mike Trout grounds out sharply, third baseman Trevor Plouffe to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Albert Pujols called out on strikes.
Jefry Marte walks.
Cameron Maybin singles on a ground ball to center fielder Rajai Davis. Jefry Marte to 2nd.
Andrelton Simmons singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Khris Davis. Jefry Marte to 3rd. Cameron Maybin to 2nd.
Danny Espinosa flies out to right fielder Matt Joyce.
Martin Maldonado singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Matt Joyce. Jefry Marte scores. Cameron Maybin scores. Andrelton Simmons to 3rd.
Yunel Escobar singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Khris Davis. Andrelton Simmons scores. Martin Maldonado to 2nd.
Kole Calhoun grounds out, second baseman Jed Lowrie to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Mike Trout grounds out sharply, second baseman Jed Lowrie to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Albert Pujols lines out sharply to center fielder Rajai Davis.
Jefry Marte strikes out swinging.
Cameron Maybin strikes out swinging.
Andrelton Simmons strikes out swinging, catcher Stephen Vogt to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Danny Espinosa grounds out sharply, shortstop Marcus Semien to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Martin Maldonado hit by pitch.
Yunel Escobar grounds into a double play, shortstop Marcus Semien to second baseman Jed Lowrie to first baseman Yonder Alonso. Martin Maldonado out at 2nd.
Kole Calhoun walks.
Mike Trout triples (1) on a ground ball to left fielder Khris Davis. Kole Calhoun scores.
Albert Pujols grounds out sharply, second baseman Jed Lowrie to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Jefry Marte grounds out, third baseman Trevor Plouffe to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Cameron Maybin grounds out, second baseman Jed Lowrie to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Andrelton Simmons pops out to first baseman Yonder Alonso in foul territory.
Pitching Change: Liam Hendriks replaces Sean Manaea.
Danny Espinosa strikes out swinging.
Martin Maldonado grounds out sharply, second baseman Jed Lowrie to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Yunel Escobar strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Ryan Madson replaces Liam Hendriks.
Kole Calhoun singles on a line drive to center fielder Rajai Davis.
Mike Trout called out on strikes.
Albert Pujols grounds into a double play, third baseman Trevor Plouffe to second baseman Jed Lowrie to first baseman Yonder Alonso. Kole Calhoun out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Ryan Dull replaces Ryan Madson.
Jefry Marte singles on a ground ball to third baseman Trevor Plouffe.
Cameron Maybin singles on a ground ball to left fielder Khris Davis. Jefry Marte to 2nd.
Andrelton Simmons grounds into a force out, shortstop Marcus Semien to second baseman Jed Lowrie. Jefry Marte to 3rd. Cameron Maybin out at 2nd. Andrelton Simmons to 1st.
Danny Espinosa homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field. Jefry Marte scores. Andrelton Simmons scores.
Martin Maldonado lines out to left fielder Khris Davis.
Yunel Escobar grounds out, shortstop Marcus Semien to first baseman Yonder Alonso.
Rajai Davis flies out to center fielder Mike Trout.
Matt Joyce grounds out to first baseman Jefry Marte.
Ryon Healy homers (1) on a fly ball to center field.
Khris Davis walks.
Stephen Vogt strikes out swinging.
Jed Lowrie homers (1) on a line drive to right center field.
Trevor Plouffe grounds out, third baseman Yunel Escobar to first baseman Jefry Marte.
Yonder Alonso grounds out, second baseman Danny Espinosa to first baseman Jefry Marte.
Marcus Semien walks.
With Rajai Davis batting, Martin Maldonado picks off Marcus Semien at 1st on throw to Jefry Marte.
Rajai Davis singles on a ground ball to shortstop Andrelton Simmons.
With Matt Joyce batting, Rajai Davis caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Martin Maldonado to shortstop Andrelton Simmons.
Matt Joyce lines out to shortstop Andrelton Simmons.
Ryon Healy walks.
Khris Davis strikes out swinging.
Stephen Vogt grounds out, shortstop Andrelton Simmons to first baseman Jefry Marte.
Jed Lowrie doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to right fielder Kole Calhoun.
Trevor Plouffe flies out sharply to center fielder Mike Trout.
Yonder Alonso flies out to left fielder Cameron Maybin.
Marcus Semien strikes out swinging.
Rajai Davis strikes out swinging.
Matt Joyce grounds out, first baseman Jefry Marte to pitcher Matt Shoemaker.
Pitching Change: Blake Parker replaces Matt Shoemaker.
Ryon Healy strikes out swinging.
Khris Davis strikes out swinging.
Stephen Vogt pops out to third baseman Yunel Escobar.
Jed Lowrie singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Kole Calhoun.
With Trevor Plouffe batting, wild pitch by Blake Parker, Jed Lowrie to 2nd.
Trevor Plouffe called out on strikes.
Yonder Alonso singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Kole Calhoun. Jed Lowrie scores.
Pitching Change: Bud Norris replaces Blake Parker.
Marcus Semien doubles (1) on a line drive to right fielder Kole Calhoun. Yonder Alonso to 3rd.

Rajai Davis triples (1) on a line drive to second baseman Danny Espinosa, deflected by first baseman Jefry Marte. Yonder Alonso scores. Marcus Semien scores. Rajai Davis scores. Throwing error by second baseman Danny Espinosa.
Matt Joyce grounds out sharply, second baseman Danny Espinosa to first baseman Jefry Marte.
Ryon Healy singles on a line drive to left fielder Cameron Maybin.
Khris Davis strikes out swinging.

Rajai Davis grounds out, second baseman Danny Espinosa to first baseman Jefry Marte.
